jcr:content.jcr:title: Application For Health Benefits

guidetermsandconditi.jcr:title: Terms and conditions
guidetermsandconditi.name: termsandconditi
guidetermsandconditi.tncCheckBoxContent: I agree to the terms & conditions
guidetermsandconditi.tncTextContent:
I am applying for health benefits.

  1. I understand that there are medical and economic features yet to be considered before I am eligible for this benefit, and that I will soon be notified of the action taken on this application.
  2. I also understand cost limitations for health benefits. Entitlements to this benefit terminates when the cost limit is reached.

text.text:
Make sure you have the following handy before you start filling the form.

 
  • Financial Records
  • Social Security Number
  • Copy of Insurance Card

\{"jcr:title":"","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-weight:bold">Directions for Sections I - III<span style="font-weight:normal">:</span></p></body>","name":"_unnamed3_draw","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P1[0].#draw[17]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="text-indent:-12.96pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold">Section I<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span><span style="font-weight:normal"> -<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span>General Information:<span style="font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal"> Answer all questions.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span></p><p style="text-indent:-12.96pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold">Section II<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span><span style="font-weight:normal"> -<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span>Military Service Information:<span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal">If you are not currently receiving benefits from VA, you may attach a copy of your discharge or separation papers from the military (such as DD-214 or, for WWII Veterans, a &quot;WD&quot; Form), with your signed application to expedite processing of your application.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>If you are currently receiving benefits from VA, we will cross-reference your information with VA data.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span></p><p style="text-indent:-12.96pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold">Section III<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span><span style="font-weight:normal"> -<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span>Insurance Information:<span style="font-size:10pt"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal">Include information for all health insurance companies that cover you, this includes coverage provided through a spouse or significant other.</span><span style="font-family:Symbol;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal">Bring your insurance cards, Medicare and/or Medicaid card with you to each health care appointment.</span></p></body>","name":"_unnamed5_draw","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P1[0].#draw[18]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;text-valign:middle;font-family:'Times New Roman'">You are not required to disclose your financial information; however, VA is not currently enrolling new applicants who decline to provide their financial information unless they have other qualifying eligibility factors.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>If a financial assessment is not used to determine your priority for enrollment you may choose not to disclose your information. However, if a financial assessment is used to determine your eligibility for cost-free medication, travel assistance or waiver of the travel deductible, and you do not disclose your financial information, you will not be eligible for these benefits.</p></body>","name":"_unnamed9_draw","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P1[0].#draw[23]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}
xfaObjects.0_x0025_5D.form_x0025_5B0_x0025_5D.F_x00: \{"jcr:title":"T 10","textIsRich":false,"_value":"INSTRUCTIONS FOR COMPLETING ENROLLMENT APPLICATION FOR HEALTH BENEFITS","name":"T10","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P1[0].T10[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 118","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:Arial">JUL 2013</p></body>","name":"T118","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P1[0].T118[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 119","textIsRich":false,"_value":"10-10EZ ","name":"T119","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P1[0].T119[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}
xfaObjects.0_x0025_5D.form_x0025_5B0_x0025_5D.F_x00: \{"jcr:title":"T 14","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-weight:bold">Financial Disclosure:<span style="font-weight:normal"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span><span style="font-size:10pt">ONLY NSC AND 0% NONCOMPENSABLE SC VETERANS MUST COMPLETE THIS SECTION TO DETERMINE ELIGIBILITY AND COPAY RESPONSIBILITY FOR VA HEALTH CARE ENROLLMENT AND/OR CARE OR SERVICES.</span></p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-weight:bold"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span>Financial Disclosure Requirements Do Not Apply To:</p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:10pt">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">   </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">a former Prisoner of War; or</span></p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:10pt">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">   </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">those in receipt of a Purple Heart; or</span></p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:10pt">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">   </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">a recently discharged Combat Veteran; or</span></p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:10pt">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">   </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">those discharged for a disability incurred or aggravated in the line of duty; or</span></p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:10pt">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">   </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">those receiving VA SC disability compensation; or</span></p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:10pt">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">   </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">those receiving VA pension; or</span></p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:10pt">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">   </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">those in receipt of Medicaid benefits; or</span></p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:10pt">·<span style="font-family:'Times New Roman'"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>those who served in Vietnam between January 9, 1962 and May 7, 1975; or</span></p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:10pt">·<span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-style:italic"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span></span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">those who served in SW Asia during the Gulf War between August 2, 1990 and November 11, 1998; or</span></p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:10pt">·<span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-style:italic"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span></span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">those who served at least 30 days at Camp Lejeune between January 1, 1957 and December 31, 1987.</span></p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></p></body>","name":"T14","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P1[0].T14[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 19","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">You may use ANY of the following to request assistance:</p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;font-family:Symbol">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">Ask VA to help you fill out the form by calling us at 1-877-222-VETS (8387).<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span></p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;font-family:Symbol">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">Access VA's website at http://www.va.gov and select &quot;Contact the VA.&quot;<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span></p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;font-family:Symbol">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">Contact the Enrollment Coordinator at your local VA health care facility.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span></p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;font-family:Symbol">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">Contact a National or State Veterans Service Organization.</span></p></body>","name":"T19","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P1[0].T19[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 20","textIsRich":false,"_value":"Where can I get help filling out the form and if I have questions?","name":"T20","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P1[0].T20[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 21","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">For Veterans to apply for enrollment in the VA health care system. The information provided on this form will be used by VA to determine your eligibility for medical benefits and on average will take 30 minutes to complete.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>This includes the time it will take to read instructions, gather the necessary facts and fill out the form.</p></body>","name":"T21","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P1[0].T21[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 22","textIsRich":false,"_value":"Please Read Before You Start . . . What is VA Form 10-10EZ used for?","name":"T22","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P1[0].T22[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 34","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="text-indent:-18pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt">SERVICE-CONNECTED (SC): A VA determination that an illness or injury was incurred or aggravated in the line of duty, in the</p><p style="text-indent:-18pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt">active military, naval or air service.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></p><p style="text-indent:-18pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt">COMPENSABLE: A VA determination that a service-connected disability is severe enough to warrant monetary compensation.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></p><p style="text-indent:-18pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt">NONCOMPENSABLE: A VA determination that a service-connected disability is not severe enough to warrant monetary</p><p style="text-indent:-18pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt">compensation.</p><p style="text-indent:-18pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt">NONSERVICE-CONNECTED (NSC): A Veteran who does not have a VA determined service-related condition.</p></body>","name":"T34","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P1[0].T34[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 75","textIsRich":false,"_value":"Complete only the sections that apply to you; sign and date the form. ","name":"T75","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P1[0].T75[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 02","textIsRich":false,"_value":"Section V - Previous Calendar Year Gross Annual Income of Veteran, Spouse and Dependent Children.","name":"T02","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P2[0].T02[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 11","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">The Paperwork Reduction Act of 1995 requires us to notify you that this information collection is in accordance with the<br />clearance requirements of Section 3507 of the Paperwork Reduction Act of 1995. We<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>may not conduct or sponsor, and<br />you are not required to respond to, a collection of information unless it displays a valid OMB number. We anticipate that<br />the time expended by all individuals who must complete this form will average 30 minutes. This includes the time it will<br />take to read instructions, gather the necessary facts and fill out the form.</p></body>","name":"T11","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P2[0].T11[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 16","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p>Privacy Act Information:<span style="font-weight:normal"> VA is asking you to provide the information on this form under 38 U.S.C. Sections 1705,1710, 1712, and 1722 in order for VA to determine your eligibility for medical benefits.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>Information you supply may be verified from initial submission forward through a computer-matching program. VA may disclose the information that you put on the form as permitted by law. VA may make a &quot;routine use&quot; disclosure of the information as outlined in the Privacy Act systems of records notices and in accordance with the VHA Notice of Privacy Practices. Providing the requested information is voluntary, but if any or all of the requested information is not provided, it may delay or result in denial of your request for health care benefits. Failure to furnish the information will not have any effect on any other benefits to which you may be entitled.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>If you provide VA your Social Security Number, VA will use it to administer your VA benefits. VA may also use this information to identify Veterans and persons claiming or receiving VA benefits and their records, and for other purposes authorized or required by law.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span></p></body>","name":"T16","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P2[0].T16[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 22","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="text-indent:-18pt;font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold">Report:</p><p style="text-indent:-14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:11pt">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">   </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt">Gross annual income from employment, except for income from your farm, ranch, property or business. Include your wages, bonuses, tips, severance pay and other accrued benefits and your child's income information if it could have been used to pay your household expenses.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span></p><p style="text-indent:-14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:11pt">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">   </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt">Net income from your farm, ranch, property, or business.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span></p><p style="text-indent:-14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:11pt">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">   </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt">Other income amounts, including retirement and pension income, Social Security Retirement and Social Security Disability income, compensation benefits such as VA disability, unemployment, Workers and black lung, cash gifts, interest and dividends, including tax exempt earnings and distributions from Individual Retirement Accounts (IRAs) or annuities.</span></p></body>","name":"T22","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P2[0].T22[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 23","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">Donations from public or private relief, welfare or charitable organizations; Supplemental Security Income (SSI)and need-based payments from a government agency; profit from the occasional sale of property; income tax refunds, reinvested interest on Individual Retirement Accounts (IRAs); scholarships and grants for school attendance; disaster relief payments; reimbursement for casualty loss; loans; Radiation Compensation Exposure Act payments; Agent Orange settlement payments; Alaska Native Claims Settlement Acts Income, payments to foster parent; amounts in joint accounts in banks and similar institutions acquired by reason of death of the other joint owner; Japanese ancestry restitution under Public Law 100-383; cash surrender value of life insurance; lump-sum proceeds of life insurance policy on a Veteran; and payments received under the Medicare transitional assistance program.</p></body>","name":"T23","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P2[0].T23[1]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 25","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p>Section VI - Previous Calendar Year Deductible E<span style="kerning-mode:pair">xpenses</span>.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></p></body>","name":"T25","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P2[0].T25[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 25","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p>Section VII - Previous Calendar Year Net Worth.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span><span style="font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></p></body>","name":"T25","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P2[0].T25[1]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 28","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">Report non-reimbursed medical expenses paid by you or your spouse.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>Include expenses for medical and dental care, drugs, eyeglasses, Medicare, medical insurance premiums and other health care expenses paid by you for dependents and persons for whom you have a legal or moral obligation to support. Do not list expenses if you expect to receive reimbursement from insurance or other sources.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>Report last illness and burial expenses, e.g., prepaid burial, paid by the Veteran for spouse or dependent(s).</p></body>","name":"T28","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P2[0].T28[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 28","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">Your net worth is the market value of all the interest and rights you have in any kind of property. However net worth does not include your single-family residence and a reasonable lot area surrounding it.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>It also does not include the personal things you use every day like your vehicle, clothing and furniture.</p></body>","name":"T28","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P2[0].T28[1]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 32","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">Read Paperwork Reduction and Privacy Act Information, Section VIII Consent to Copays and Assignment of<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>Benefits.</p></body>","name":"T32","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P2[0].T32[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 33","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">In Section VIII, you or an individual to whom you have delegated your Power of<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>Attorney must sign and date the form.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>If you sign with an &quot;X&quot;, 2 people you know must witness you as you sign.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>They must sign the form and print their names.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>If the form is not signed and dated appropriately, VA will return it for you to complete.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span></p></body>","name":"T33","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P2[0].T33[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 34","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman'">Attach any continuation sheets, a copy of supporting materials and your Power of Attorney documents<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>to your application.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span></p></body>","name":"T34","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P2[0].T34[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 36","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p>Mail the original application and supporting materials to the Health Eligibility Center, 2957 Clairmont Road, Suite 200</p><p>Atlanta, GA 30329.</p></body>","name":"T36","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P2[0].T36[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 38","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span><span style="font-size:12pt;font-weight:bold">Section IV</span><span style="font-size:12pt"> -<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span><span style="font-size:12pt;font-weight:bold">Dependent Information</span><span style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:bold">:</span><span style="font-weight:bold"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span>Include the following:</p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;text-indent:-14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:11pt">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">   </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt">Your spouse even if you did not live together, as long as you contributed support last calendar year.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span></p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;text-indent:-14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:11pt">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">   </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt">Your biological children, adopted children, and stepchildren who are unmarried and under the age of 18, or at least 18 but under 23 and attending high school, college or vocational school (full or part-time), or became permanently unable to support themselves before age 18.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span></p><p style="margin-left:14.4pt;text-indent:-14.4pt;font-family:Symbol;font-size:11pt">·<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">   </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10pt">Child support contributions. Contributions can include tuition or clothing payments or payments of medical bills.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span></span></p></body>","name":"T38","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P2[0].T38[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}
xfaObjects.0025_5B0_x0025_5D.F_x0025_5B0_x0025_5D.P: \{"jcr:title":"Current Marital Status","options":["1= MARRIED","2= NEVER MARRIED","3= SEPARATED","4= WIDOWED","5= DIVORCED"],"name":"CurrentMaritalStatus","guideNodeClass":"guideRadioButton","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P3[0].CurrentMaritalStatus[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guideradiobutton"}

xfaObjects.0_x0025_5D.form_x0025_5B0_x0025_5D.F_x00: \{"jcr:title":"T 22","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="line-height:10pt">I understand that pursuant to 38 U.S.C. Section 1729 and 42 U.S.C. 2651, the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) is authorized to recover or collect from my health plan (HP) or any other legally responsible third party for the reasonable charges of nonservice-connected VA medical care or services furnished or provided to me. I hereby authorize payment directly to VA from any HP under which I am covered (including coverage provided under my spouse's HP) that is responsible for payment of the charges for my medical care, including benefits otherwise payable to me or my spouse. Furthermore, I hereby assign to the VA any claim I may have against any person or entity who is or may be legally responsible for the payment of the cost of medical services provided to me by the VA. I understand that this assignment shall not limit or prejudice my right to recover for my own benefit any amount in excess of the cost of medical services provided to me by the VA or any other amount to which I may be entitled. I hereby appoint the Attorney General of the United States and the Secretary of Veterans' Affairs and their designees as my Attorneys-in-fact to take all necessary and appropriate actions in order to recover and receive all or part of the amount herein assigned. I hereby authorize the VA to disclose, to my attorney and to any third party or administrative agency who may be responsible for payment of the cost of medical services provided to me, information from my medical records as necessary to verify my claim. Further, I hereby authorize any such third party or administrative agency to disclose to the VA any information regarding my claim.</p></body>","name":"T22","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P4[0].T22[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 23","textIsRich":false,"_value":"ALL APPLICANTS MUST SIGN AND DATE THIS FORM. REFER TO INSTRUCTIONS WHICH DEFINE WHO CAN SIGN ON BEHALF OF THE VETERAN.","name":"T23","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P4[0].T23[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 27","textIsRich":false,"_value":"SECTION VIII - CONSENT TO COPAYS AND TO RECEIVE COMMUNICATIONS","name":"T27","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P4[0].T27[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 28","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-weight:bold">By submitting this application you are agreeing to pay the applicable VA copays for treatment or services of your NSC conditions as required by law. You also agree to receive communications from VA to your supplied email or mobile number.</p></body>","name":"T28","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P4[0].T28[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 54","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p>1. TOTAL NON-REIMBURSED MEDICAL EXPENSES PAID BY YOU OR YOUR SPOUSE<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:7pt;font-style:italic">(e.g., payments for doctors, dentists, medications, Medicare, health<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>insurance, hospital and nursing home) VA will calculate a deductible and the net medical expenses you may claim.</span><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></p></body>","name":"T54","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P4[0].T54[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 55","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:Arial">2. AMOUNT YOU PAID LAST CALENDAR YEAR FOR FUNERAL AND BURIAL EXPENSES (INCLUDING PREPAID BURIAL EXPENSES) FOR YOUR DECEASED SPOUSE OR DEPENDENT CHILD<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:7pt;font-style:italic">(Also enter spouse or child's information in Section VI.)</span><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></p></body>","name":"T55","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P4[0].T55[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 56","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:Arial">3. AMOUNT YOU PAID LAST CALENDAR YEAR FOR YOUR COLLEGE OR VOCATIONAL EDUCATIONAL EXPENSES<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:7pt;font-style:italic">(e.g., tuition, books, fees, materials)<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span></p><p style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:7pt;font-style:italic">DO NOT LIST YOUR DEPENDENTS' EDUCATIONAL EXPENSES.<span style="font-family:Arial;font-size:6pt;font-style:normal"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span></p></body>","name":"T56","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P4[0].T56[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 67","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p>1. GROSS ANNUAL INCOME FROM EMPLOYMENT<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:7pt;font-style:italic">(wages, bonuses, tips, etc.)</span><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>EXCLUDING INCOME FROM YOUR FARM, RANCH, PROPERTY OR BUSINESS<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></p></body>","name":"T67","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P4[0].T67[0]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 67","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:Arial">1. CASH AMOUNT IN BANK ACCOUNTS<span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:7pt"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:7pt;font-style:italic">(e.g., checking, savings accounts, certificates of deposit, individual retirement accounts, stocks and bonds)</span></p></body>","name":"T67","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P4[0].T67[1]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 67","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:Arial">2. MARKET VALUE OF LAND AND BUILDINGS MINUS MORTGAGES AND LIENS.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:7pt;font-style:italic">(e.g., second home and non-incoming producing property.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes">  </span>Do not count your primary home.)</span></p></body>","name":"T67","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P4[0].T67[2]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

\{"jcr:title":"T 67","textIsRich":true,"_value":"<body><p style="font-family:Arial">3. VALUE OF OTHER PROPERTY OR ASSETS<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:7pt;font-style:italic">(e.g., art, rare coins, collectables)</span><span style="font-style:italic"><span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span></span>MINUS THE AMOUNT YOU OWE ON THESE ITEMS. INCLUDE VALUE OF FARM, RANCH OR BUSINESS ASSETS.<span style="xfa-spacerun:yes"> </span><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:7pt;font-style:italic">Exclude household effects and family vehicles.</span></p></body>","name":"T67","guideNodeClass":"guideTextDraw","jcr:primaryType":"nt:unstructured","bindRef":"xfa[0].form[0].F[0].P4[0].T67[3]","sling:resourceType":"fd/af/components/guidetextdraw"}

text_1.text:
Required *

Fields marked with (*) are required fields. You will not be able to Submit the application without at least completing these fields.

 

To Save the in-progress version of the form, you can click save button. You may go back and Edit the form information any time you like.

 

The reset button will remove all filled values from the form fields.

 

Please Note that Submit will just check that the most necessary (required) fields have been filled by you.

text.text:
I am applying for health benefits.

  1. I understand that there are medical and economic features yet to be considered before I am eligible for this benefit, and that I will soon be notified of the action taken on this application.
  2. I also understand cost limitations for health benefits. Entitlements to this benefit terminates when the cost limit is reached.

Make sure you have the following handy before you start filling the form.

  • Complete Address/Address proof
  • Service Record Details
  • VA File Number and Location
  • Social Security Number
